channel.title: Berserker ring doesnt give me any stat bonuses
channel.description: i need help on how to fix this ive got all the other rings to work (seer's, archer's and warrior) rings to works but berserker ring just wont work i can equip it but it doesnt give me any stat bonus and in shop its called !! NON EXISTING ITEM !!! - ID:6737: can someone help me out please this is what berserker ring look like in my item.cfg tell me if theres anything wrong with it it3m = 6737 Berserker_Ring A_ring_reputed_to_bring_out_a_berserk_fury_in_its_wearer. 6000 6000 8000 0 0 4 0 0 0 0 4 0 0 4 0

item.title: Berserker ring doesnt give me any stat bonuses
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

fine ill report,open up your item.java and search for public static int ring[]
youll see lots of item codes next to it,just make a space near 1 of them and add the berserker ring code.Should fix the problem.

Read full topic
